content:
<rule id="quarkus-narayana-jta-00010" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <dependency artifactId="narayana-jta" groupId="org.jboss.narayana.jta"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace the 'narayana-jta' dependency with Quarkus 'quarkus-narayana-jta' extension">
                    <message>
                        Replace the `org.jboss.narayana.jta:narayana-jta` dependency with the Quarkus dependency `io.quarkus:quarkus-narayana-jta`  
                        Further information in the link below.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/transaction" title="Quarkus - Guide"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
